action.content:
You are participating in a collaborative guessing game.
The goal is to find out whether this picture and another picture only I can see, are the same.
Please describe your image first. Then, I will provide my description and we can ask each other questions about the images to figure out whether they are the same. Now start your short image description with "DESCRIPTION:" followed by the description. Do not add anything else.

DESCRIPTION: The image consists of several Tetris-like shapes in different colors on a white background. There is a purple cross shape at the top left, three green shapes in the middle, two orange shapes at the bottom left and middle, and two pink shapes at the top right and middle right.

You are participating in a collaborative guessing game.
The goal is to find out whether this picture and another picture only I can see, are the same.
Please describe your image first. Then, I will provide my description and we can ask each other questions about the images to figure out whether they are the same. Now start your short image description with "DESCRIPTION:" followed by the description. Do not add anything else.

DESCRIPTION: The image consists of several Tetris-like shapes in different colors on a white background. There is a purple cross shape at the top left, three green shapes resembling the letter "T" in the middle, two orange shapes resembling the letter "Z" at the bottom left and middle, and two pink shapes resembling the letter "T" at the top right and bottom right.

This is my DESCRIPTION: The image consists of several Tetris-like shapes in different colors on a white background. There is a purple cross shape at the top left, three green shapes in the middle, two orange shapes at the bottom left and middle, and two pink shapes at the top right and middle right.
Now ask a question in order to find out new aspects of my image that may be different to your image. Start with "QUESTION:" and do not add anything else.
QUESTION: Do any of the green shapes in your image resemble the letter "T"?

This is my DESCRIPTION: The image consists of several Tetris-like shapes in different colors on a white background. There is a purple cross shape at the top left, three green shapes resembling the letter "T" in the middle, two orange shapes resembling the letter "Z" at the bottom left and middle, and two pink shapes resembling the letter "T" at the top right and bottom right.
QUESTION: Do any of the green shapes in your image resemble the letter "T"? Start your answer with "ANSWER:" and do not add anything else.
Now ask a question in order to find out new aspects of my image that may be different to your image. Start with "QUESTION:" and do not add anything else.
QUESTION: Are the two pink shapes in your image identical in orientation?

ANSWER: Yes
QUESTION: Are the two pink shapes in your image identical in orientation? Start your answer with "ANSWER:" and do not add anything else.

Now come to a decision. What do you think: are your picture and the other picture described the same picture?  Write "DECISION: same image" if you think they are the same picture or "DECISION: different images" if you think they are different pictures. Do not add anything else.

ANSWER: No
